TopicTitle: So a friend of mine found marijuana.

Articles.Content:
I was at a boy scout cleanup by the local preschool, and there\'s a very small ravine next to it. We were cleaning up trash in there (yes, we were using the pokey trash sticks) and my friend pokes a small envelope. He opens it and finds the marijuana. We hand it in to an adult, I was ready to call the police. The adults handled it and gave it to the police.

In other news, afterwards I got hot dogs, pretzels, and oreos, and I almost lost my retainer.
I didnt like the way this thread was looking when i opened it up...
Damn I could go for a hotdog right now...

Wow, how were the pretzels?

Good.

Not soft though :/
hahaha nice swich of topic. in my news i dug up my gameboy advanced and put pokemon emerald in (it was the only one i have, all right?)
